title: Brand-New Postcard Luxury in Gir National Park with Daily Breakfast & Daily Dining Credit
description:
Do you often find yourself dreaming of a relaxing vacation in the lap of nature, away from the chaotic lifestyle of the city? Then the brand-new Postcard Gir Wildlife Sanctuary was made just for you. Hidden within 16 acres of lush Kesar mango orchards and less than 30 minutes from the famous Gir National Park, this wildlife retreat comes with the promise of boutique luxury, total privacy, immersive experiences and transformative serenity.

Take refuge in one of just 15 rooms in this undisturbed region of Gujarat, which is easily accessible from major cities like Mumbai and Ahmedabad. It's time to slow down and relax: The Postcard Gir Wildlife Sanctuary will ensure you are making the most of your holiday with 24-hour check-in and checkout (subject to availability), all-day breakfast, artisanal food and drinks, and premium local experiences. Don't miss out on a wildlife safari in Gir National Park, where you can spot beautiful Asiatic lions.
offer_address: Veraval - Talala Rd, Kailash Nagar, Highway, Talala, Gujarat 362150
